text: Dr Bizay Sonkar Shastri (born 24 September 1959) is an Indian politician from Bharatiya Janata Party. Born to Shivlal Sonkar and Munni Devi on 24 September 1959 in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, Bizay had four brothers and four sisters; his elder brother Shri Rajnath Sonkar is a Member of Parliament. He is married to Dr. Suman Sonkar Shastri and has two sons.Valmiki community have Brahmin past says BJP leader Bizay Sonkar Shastri Shastri ji spent his early years of life in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, where he completed his primary education from Central Hindu Boys School and intermediate from National Inter College. After this, he completed his Masters from the Banaras Hindu University. He was elected to LoSabha from Saidpurin 1998 elections and was subsequently chosen as the Chairman of ST/SC Commission (Government of India). In 2004, he was appointed as the Vice-chairman of National SC/ST front (BJP) and was elected as the National Executive Member of Bharatiya Janata Party in 2008 ==References== Category:12th Lok Sabha members Category:Politicians from Varanasi Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Lok Sabha members from Uttar Pradesh Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:Vishva Hindu Parishad members Category:Banaras Hindu University alumni Category:Sampurnanand Sanskrit Vishwavidyalaya alumni Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:People from Ghazipur district
